mapper.insert: insert into place( place_id, place_depth1, place_depth2, place_depth3 ) values( #{placeId}, #{placeDepth1}, #{placeDepth2}, #{placeDepth3} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT place_depth1 FROM place ORDER BY place_depth1 ASC

select p.place_id as placeId, p.place_depth1 as placeDepth1, p.place_depth2 as placeDepth2, p.place_depth3 as placeDepth3 from place p join restaurant r on r.restaurant_place = p.place_id where r.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
